pr_title: [MOB-1192] Remove animation from Dialog Fragment startup

timeline.message:
[MOB-1192] Remove animation from Dialog Fragment startup

Hiding and showing in-app before resizing to avoid animation effect.

Added webview status to have better granularity

Now the resize script will be called when webview starts loading and also when the page is finished loading, removing the possibility of hiding the webview for long time caused due to delayed resource loading.
For Dialog implementation to have same experience as previous implementation, the resize script will be processed only if the webview status is loaded.
Fix resizing in-apps, disable fullscreen for non-fullscreen in-apps

Removing webview status variables

Not required anymore as the page will be refreshed based on progress updates and not just start and finish

timeline.bodyText: Do we not need this anymore?
timeline.author: vbabenkoru

replies.bodyText: this was a boolean flag which was replaced with tri-state : not loaded, initialized and finished loading, which was then replaced by our new granular refresh.
replies.author: Ayyanchira

replies.bodyText: Hmm, but this was there before.. Was there a reason why we can't resize on rotation until it's loaded? Seems too specific.
replies.author: vbabenkoru

timeline.bodyText: Looks like this is not doing anything.
